description: A bundle of information about a query result.

queryResults.description: The total number of rows that match the query. Use mask = 0x1 to include in the bundle.

queryCount.description: The total number of rows that match the query. Use mask = 0x2 to include in the bundle.

selectColumns.description: The list of ColumnModels from the select clause. Use mask = 0x4 to include in the bundle.

maxRowsPerPage.description: The maximum number of rows that can be retrieved in a single call.  This is a function of the columns that are selected in the query. Use mask = 0x8 to include in the bundle.
